title: GeoBoost
tagline: Boost your visibility in ChatGPT and co.
subtitle: Keep track of your brand and content across AI search platforms like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google Overview with our innovative dashboard. The beta is coming very soon!

features.title: Privacy & Control

faq.question: When will the beta version be available?
faq.answer: We plan to launch the beta version in August 2025.

faq.question: How can I join the beta?
faq.answer: Simply enter your email ‚Äì we‚Äôll notify you when it launches.

faq.question: What are the system requirements?
faq.answer: GeoBoost runs in all modern browsers and offers APIs for Node.js, Python & more.

faq.question: Is there a free version?
faq.answer: Yes! The beta is completely free. After launch, we‚Äôll offer a freemium model.

faq.question: What makes GeoBoost unique?
faq.answer: GeoBoost combines geodata with AI analysis in an intuitive dashboard.

faq.question: Can I integrate GeoBoost into my system?
faq.answer: Yes ‚Äì we offer flexible APIs and SDKs for seamless integration.
